html:
11.7.21  11:42 am   is your song "here comes the sun" based on "and the day goes on"?

      no. most of 'here comes the sun' was written much earlier than 'and the day goes on'

11.7.21  11:38 am   what is your favorite letter?

      using different letters together is the only thing that does it for me anymore

11.7.21  9:53 am   What motivates you to motivate everything?

      knowing that if i do that, everything's probably gonna motivate me back

11.7.21  5:01 am   How do I deal with incredible guilt?

      start by explaining exactly what you think you did wrong (or didn't do right)

11.7.21  3:24 am   how do i make myself feel tall?

      stand on a chair

11.7.21  2:23 am   thoughts on iq tests?

      i'm just imagining how smart the test creators must be

11.7.21  2:17 am   how being a human goin for ya

      it's a total mind fuck

11.7.21  1:26 am   The word "enfatuation" doesn't appear in any dictionary. Are you sure you didn't mean "infatuation"?

      you're right, i did

11.7.21  1:04 am   what does the 34th word in your 47th video mean

      my 47th video probably has less than 34 words. most of my videos were shorter back then

11.6.21  11:29 pm   How do you focus?

      step 1 is to identify what the thing is that you would like to focus on. this may seem simple, but i don't feel like you've done that so far, or at least if you did you didn't tell me about it

11.6.21  11:26 pm   2.28.19  11:40 am are any of these songs on your website?

      how about 'write a tune that really sucks' (except for the tonal keyboard intro)

11.6.21  10:25 pm   What is Steve's real name

      it's your name

11.6.21  9:07 pm   Is At the Airport Terminal an extended metaphor about death("saying goodbye to the world I know" or "one day soon we will all be together" both illustrate afterlife)?

      that angle does seem to work

11.6.21  9:04 pm   i think i have a identity crisis. how do i dig out of my identity hole

      make a list of your top 10 favorite identities

11.6.21  8:19 pm   what is your favourite time 

      Sunday, November 7, 2021 1:47:50 AM

11.6.21  8:16 pm   are the cold winds still coming in at you?

      they are stronger now

11.6.21  8:06 pm   please brag about yourself a little more

      i can tell the difference between calvary and cavalry

11.6.21  7:27 pm   honestly someone probably asked u this already since this is a well known and popular religion but i was wondering if you would like to join the holy cannoli and his desciples

      sure i'd be glad to do that

11.6.21  7:04 pm   Can you make more videos please?

      i almost didn't even think of that

11.6.21  5:38 pm   what does the chrome mean in monochrome

      color

11.6.21  3:52 pm   Do you think that if Mt. Saint Helen actually blew up one day your song would be an accurate portrayal of that event?

      not quite

11.6.21  3:11 pm   Do you have any idea when you will perform in person concerts?

     no

     I daydream about this scenario quite regularly

11.6.21  1:45 pm   so bill, what gave you the idea to make music?

      it must have been music

11.6.21  12:38 pm   do you really like making songs and animating your videos? 

      it would be nice if i could distill the the whole thing much further, into just the elements that matter most. this would make the whole process more potent, more efficient, and i'd also be much happier

11.6.21  11:15 am   Bill I don't want to accomplish anything I just want to BE. I want to just walk the Earth and exist, but nonetheless I often feel like I'm doing that wrong somehow. I have the nagging idea that I must achieve and be productive but I only wish to produce joy. Must I struggle against something (like producing music) or do I just need to get over myself?

      one of the fascinating things about living here is that there are so many ways you can do things. what the hell, even the wrong ways may be right

11.6.21  10:40 am   Are you gonna go on tour

      that would be a friendly idea

11.6.21  6:34 am   are you the president 

      is there a way to test that

11.6.21  1:36 am   thoughts on MBTI?

      the result changes if you answer the questions differently each time

11.6.21  12:32 am   any specific chord changes you would recommend I learn to improv over?

      how about some of your favorite songs. or, if you like to read, for a twist you can pick up a song book full of things you've never heard and start using those

11.6.21  12:27 am   are you familiar with the hexagrams of the i ching?

      i've seen them and taken some time to digest them emotionally but i haven't memorized them

11.6.21  12:23 am   would it be worse if everything matters or nothing matters

      matters to what/whom

11.5.21  11:11 pm   Why am I so affected by books?

      because of the way they're written

11.5.21  11:10 pm   what instruments are in your random instrument system list?

      there's a lot of plucks. maybe too many plucks. but i don't mind this, it's for my own good surely

11.5.21  9:54 pm   how do you deal with the pressure of seeming professional? 

      how about this: find the common ground between what seems professional and what seems genuinely awesome. then everyone will be happy, including you

11.5.21  7:50 pm   help Im trapped in a pre rendered 3d environment 

      ok i'll be right over

11.5.21  7:33 pm   why are you so good at music. tell me.

      i must have made the decision in early childhood that it would fulfill my needs somehow

11.5.21  7:06 pm   can you describe the feeling of being at a crosswalk?

      all different feelings, depending on the geographical region, depending on the mechanics of the light sequence, or if there's no light then some social dynamics come into play, which again will vary based on the region

11.5.21  6:31 pm   Would you recommend that others should listen to your music?

      that seems like it's gotta be some kind of social faux pas, to recommend your own music to someone

11.5.21  5:17 pm   hey man, you used to say the word 'reasonable' a lot more. What happened? 

      i've had an infatuation with that word

11.5.21  4:10 pm   how do i know if im being lied to?

      it probably would help if you knew the truth somehow

11.5.21  3:35 pm   do you care about the fact that we now call artists "content creators"? i mean it isn't wrong but it kinda screws everything about art, no?

      i doubt it. it's just a longer phrase, so you are going to lose that extra 1 second of time if you do end up using that phrase. it's also less specific, so the advantage is it possibly encompasses more than just artists. but if you specifically think you're talking about an artist, then you might want to say 'artist' in that case, for 2 reasons: a shorter phrase and in that case more accurate. in other cases, a different description might be more applicable. 'bookreviewer'...... 'chef'...... many different terms, with varying levels of specificity, and varying levels of accuracy too, which of course is the nature of language probably, as usual

11.5.21  2:42 pm   whats so funny

      how about a surprise beginning

11.5.21  2:42 pm   hey bill, do you master your own songs?

     yes

     if you don't, do you mind sharing who does (np if not)? and if you do, any simple tips for someone who'd also like to master their own little songs? mastering is just such a dark art to me and your shit sounds insanely good and crisp every time

     i think that's mixing, but no need to split hairs...... What i've noticed is, the more you stick to the obvious thing that matters at each moment, the stronger it's going to be. another way of looking at it is, ........ to put it in terms of road cones..... the best road cones are just bright red. not the ones with the floural print. also try not to put reverb on the kick

11.5.21  2:16 pm   do you think someone can live a good life in isolation

      i'm not sure

11.5.21  1:46 pm   how are you right now

      pretty good

11.5.21  11:42 am   bill. how to make luscious key changes?

      it really all depends on the rest of the *content* at play. character motivations, etc

11.5.21  11:39 am   Have you considered touring/performing at jazz festivals?

      no

11.5.21  10:54 am   i have had a Question that has been killing me... how does a person sleep?

      i have no idea

11.5.21  10:54 am   what is your favorite work

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

11.5.21  8:44 am   Ways to get motivated

      what would you like to accomplish
